content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the not your abuelita s blanket this pattern also includes a crochet diagram and multiple colour combinations size 5 sizes available skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn bernat blanket i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #cloudblanket refund there are no refunds on patterns resell finished product with pattern credit © 2023 cj design all rights reserved
